message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly exceptional and I believe it would be a great asset to you. Considering its value and benefits, I propose a price of $950000 for this opportunity.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $850000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I would like to propose a price of $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $875000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I've considered your proposal and I would like to counter with an offer of $925000 for the product.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $890000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, I am proposing a price of $910000 for the product.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $895000.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I am proposing a final price of $905000 for the product.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $897500.
